metadata.name: Suspicious SysAidServer Child
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious child processes of SysAidServer (as seen in MERCURY threat actor intrusions)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\java.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\javaw.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('sysaidserver')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious child processes of SysAidServer (as seen in MERCURY threat actor intrusions)
